name: Mining Rail
description: Mining Rail is a roller coaster game! Find your way through the Ghost Mine and the most impressive mines around the world and start a journey from deep inside the mountains down to the safe station at the end of the track.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: keyboard or controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: controller
